queries.query: CREATE TABLE d_m${localChannelId} ( id bigint NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, server_id character varying(36), received_date timestamp NOT NULL, processed boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE, import_id bigint, import_channel_id character varying(36) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE d_mm${localChannelId} ( id integer NOT NULL, message_id bigint NOT NULL, received_date timestamp NOT NULL, status character(1) NOT NULL, connector_name text, send_attempts integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, send_date timestamp, response_date timestamp, error_code integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, chain_id integer NOT NULL, order_id integer NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT mm${localChannelId}_pkey PRIMARY KEY(message_id, id), CONSTRAINT mm${localChannelId}_fkey FOREIGN KEY(message_id) REFERENCES d_m${localChannelId}(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB;
CREATE INDEX d_mm${localChannelId}_index2 ON d_mm${localChannelId}(message_id, id)
CREATE INDEX d_mm${localChannelId}_index3 ON d_mm${localChannelId}(message_id, id, status)

CREATE TABLE d_mc${localChannelId} ( metadata_id integer NOT NULL, message_id bigint NOT NULL, content_type integer NOT NULL, content text, is_encrypted boolean NOT NULL, data_type character varying(255), CONSTRAINT mc${localChannelId}_pkey PRIMARY KEY(message_id, metadata_id, content_type), CONSTRAINT mc${localChannelId}_fkey FOREIGN KEY(message_id, metadata_id) REFERENCES d_mm${localChannelId}(message_id, id) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB;
CREATE INDEX d_mc${localChannelId}_index2 ON d_mc${localChannelId}(message_id, metadata_id)
CREATE INDEX d_mc${localChannelId}_index3 ON d_mc${localChannelId}(message_id, metadata_id, content_type)
CREATE INDEX d_mcm${localChannelId}_index2 ON d_mcm${localChannelId}(message_id, metadata_id)

CREATE TABLE d_ma${localChannelId} ( id character varying(255) NOT NULL, message_id bigint NOT NULL, type character varying(40), segment_id integer NOT NULL, size integer NOT NULL, content longblob, CONSTRAINT ma${localChannelId}_fkey FOREIGN KEY(message_id) REFERENCES d_m${localChannelId}(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE d_ms${localChannelId} ( metadata_id integer, received bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, received_lifetime bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, filtered bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, filtered_lifetime bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, transformed bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, transformed_lifetime bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, pending bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, pending_lifetime bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, sent bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, sent_lifetime bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, error bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, error_lifetime bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 ) ENGINE=InnoDB;
CREATE TABLE d_channels ( local_channel_id bigint NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, channel_id character varying(36) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT unique_channel_id UNIQUE (channel_id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB

CREATE TABLE d_events ( event_id bigint NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, event_type integer NOT NULL, channel_id character varying(36) NOT NULL, metadata_id integer, message_id bigint, message_status character(1), event_date timestamp NOT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB
